response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds immense significance to me, but I am confident it could also bring unparalleled value to your collection or business. Considering its rarity and quality, I am offering it to you for $750,000. I believe this price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also provides a reasonable margin for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange for a viewing. I look forward to potentially working with you on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 750000}
